mixed-citation.article-title: Reclassification of the doryctine tribe Rhaconotini (Hymenoptera, Braconidae)

Neorhaconotus rieki Belokobylskij, Iqbal & Austin, 2004

Neorhaconotus rieki Belokobylskij, Iqbal & Austin, 2004

tp:treatment-sec.p:
The description of this species was based on a single specimen ( holotype ) (Belokobylskij et al., 2004). We have not studied any new additional specimen for description of morphological variation of
N. rieki
.
